channel.title: Selling ancient artifacts to mandrith for pkp
channel.description:
Hello, I was wondering how I could make it so that when you get a ancient artifact from pking you can sell it to mandrith for a certain pkp price. Would be great if someone knew how or knows a tut for it.
Thanks.

item.title: Selling ancient artifacts to mandrith for pkp
item.dc:creator: @RSBRAH RSBRAH
item.description:
@RSBRAH wrote:

Yes, but how would I make it so it gives a certain amount of pkp per artifact?

Read full topic
item.source: Selling ancient artifacts to mandrith for pkp

item.title: Selling ancient artifacts to mandrith for pkp
item.dc:creator: @KempiScape KempiScape
item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

you could set up a dialogue and within the dialogue check if the player has any ancient artifacts
